headline: MGM Resorts International (MGM): Among HG Vora Capital Management’s Stock Picks For 2025
summary: We recently compiled a list of the HG Vora Capital Management’s Stock Picks For 2025. In this article, we are going to take a look at where MGM Resorts International (NYSE:MGM) stands against the other stocks.
